resources.string: In conjunction with the celebration of 80th Anniversary of Malaysian Nature Society (MNS) in championing nature conservation and wildlife protection through research and advocacy in Malaysia, we are proud to be the co-organiser of the Ecotrail Putrajaya 2019, in our quest to create greater awareness for all Malaysians in preserving our mother nature. \n\nWe invite all to participate in the MNS 5km category and together, we shall run for a greener tomorrow.
Let us join SHERUN Gorgeous Girl 2020! \n\nYou can choose either to join 2.5km or 5km, grab the super early bird ticket now!!

The Great Malaysia Marathon Series 2019 is series of running events that will be held across Malaysiaâ€™s two states namely Cyberjaya and Johor. The event is aimed to expand to other states of Malaysia in 2020 depending on feasibility, demand, and public response. It will be held as part of an effort to bring Malaysians from different races, gender, ages or religions together and celebrate our uniqueness.
